dashboard.readout

Class CompassReadout.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • dashboard.readout.CompassReadout.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    CompassReadout

    public static final class CompassReadout.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for the CompassReadout class.
    Author:
    Mark Sabini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(double width, double height)
      Creates a Builder specifying a CompassReadout with the given dimensions.

      Specifies the goal of the CompassReadout.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(double width,
               double height)
        Creates a Builder specifying a CompassReadout with the given dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - the width of the CompassReadout
        height - the height of the CompassReadout

    • Method Detail

      • withGoal

        public CompassReadout.Builder withGoal(acm.graphics.GPoint goal)
        Specifies the goal of the CompassReadout. The goal is allowed to be null, as that will "clear" the CompassReadout.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal towards which the CompassReadout's needle should point
        Returns:
        the current Builder

      • withLocation

        public CompassReadout.Builder withLocation(acm.graphics.GPoint position,
                                           acm.graphics.GPoint bearing)
        Specifies the initial position and bearing from which the CompassReadout should orient itself and its needle. The position and bearing must be either both null or both non-null.
        Parameters:
        position - the initial position of the CompassReadout
        bearing - the initial bearing of the CompassReadout
        Returns:
        the current Builder
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the position and bearing are not both null or both non-null

      • build

        public CompassReadout build()
        Creates a new CompassReadout with the Builder's parameters.
        Returns:
        a new CompassReadout with the Builder's parameters
